press_button.description: Press the button to start the coffee brewing process.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to select the type of coffee or to adjust the strength of the coffee.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure the smooth rotation.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine to remove any coffee stains or spills.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the button, knob, and body.
